author: Special Correspondent
text: A five-member gang hacked to death K. Pushpavalli (48) on the Tiruchi – Thanjavur national highway at Sengipatti near here on Wednesday when she was returning to her house at Melanatham in Tiruvarur district. Police said she came to meet her son Prabhakar who has been imprisoned in Tiruchi Central Prison in connection with a murder case. Prabhakar had allegedly murdered one his relatives recently and sent to remand.
title: Gang murders woman
